title: Behaviour patterns and survival
brief_description: Depicts the behaviour of the Slaty Backed Gull. Types of chick behaviour, innate and learned are shown by response to parent’s voice. Originally in Japanese - dubbed into English. Suitable for Mid-Upper Secondary level students.
